item.title: 'Entirely foreseeable': The L.A. fires are the worst-case scenario experts feared - NBC News
item.description:
1. 'Entirely foreseeable': The L.A. fires are the worst-case scenario experts feared  NBC News
  2. The Los Angeles wildfires are climate disasters compounded  The Guardian
